text: Morten Sigval Bergesen (born 9 June 1974) is a Norwegian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Norway Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Stavanger
title: Morten Bergesen
